snippet: Yodlee, a public company for less than a year, will give Envestnet, a software provider, a new tool to market to financial advisers.
abstract: Software provider Envestnet will purchase Yodlee, online hub for consumer financial apps, for roughly $660 million; deal is meant to give Envestnet customers new tool for managing their clients' money.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Yodlee, a public company for less than a year, will give Envestnet, a software provider, a new tool to market to financial advisers.

headline.main: Yodlee, a Hub for Financial Apps, Sells Itself to Envestnet
headline.print_headline: Yodlee, a Hub for Financial Apps, Sells Itself to Envestnet
